componentDescription: A versatile component for building navigation structures, offering customizable orientation, size, and visual styles.

items.description: Defines an optional array of navigation items to be displayed in the menu.

children.description: Represents the child elements to be rendered within the navigation menu.

orientation.description: Specifies the layout orientation of the navigation menu (e.g., horizontal or vertical).

size.description: Determines the predefined size of the navigation menu components.

variant.description: Defines the visual style or variant of the navigation menu.

defaultActiveItemId.description: The ID of the item that should be active by default when the menu initializes.

defaultExpandedItemIds.description: An array of item IDs that should be expanded by default when the menu initializes.

onItemActivate.description: Callback function triggered when a navigation item is activated, receiving the item's ID.

views.description: Custom styles to apply to different parts of the navigation menu.
